articles.title: Nicholas Rossi: Man arrested on COVID ward in Scotland is American rape suspect who faked his own death, court rules - Sky News
articles.content:
A court has ruled for the first time that a man arrested on a COVID ward in Scotland is an American rape suspect who faked his own death.
